Note.Content: NJPS REB NJB "sitting on" [1b] | NRSV NIV GNT "living among" [1a]

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

= causative action by which humans cause other humans to assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
literally: to sit on a throne; hence: = action by which humans or deities assume a position of leadership, ◄ symbolized by taking position on the seat that represents this position of authority

literally: to make (someone) sit on a throne; hence: = causative action by which deities cause humans to assume a position of leadership, ◄ symbolized by having them taking position on the seat that represents this position of authority
= action by which humans or deities assume a position of leadership, ◄ as if sitting on an actual throne
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
= causative action by which humans cause other humans to remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
= state in which an object has been placed in a certain location with the intention that it will stay there for an extended period of time
= causative action by which humans place an object in a certain location with the intention that it will stay there for an extended period of time
= state in which a place or area has been made the home of humans
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to make a certain place or area their home
= causative action by which deities cause a certain place or area to become the home of humans
= a location that has been chosen by humans or deities as their dwelling place
= causative action by which humans brings other humans into their home as their spouse
literally: to sit; hence: = a process by which a certain condition persists over a relatively long period of time
literally: to sit; hence: = causative action by which humans cause a certain condition to persist over a relatively long period of time
read שְׁבִי
read שׁוב
see {L:יֹשֵׁב בַּשֶּׁבֶת<SDBH:יֹשֵׁב בַּשֶּׁבֶת>}
